alumniOf.name:
NY. He served in the U.S. Air Force from 2000-2007. He is a veteran of Operation Enduring Freedom and received the Joint Service Achievement Medal for his work as a Spanish linguist for the Defense Intelligence Agency in 2005. William graduated from Campbell University in 2007 with a degree in computer science. He earned his J.D. in 2011 from the North Carolina Central University School of Law. His practice areas include immigration law and criminal defense cases. He is licensed and in good standing with the State Bar of North Carolina and a member of the American Immigration Lawyer Association (AILA.) He is a proud member of the Charlotte community and provides compassionate counsel for all his clients.

content.heroSection:
Law Firm Helping Those Charged With Crimes in Wake County, and Smithfield, NC

At Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, we know we all occasionally make mistakes. In some cases, however, a simple mistake could lead to misdemeanor or felony criminal charges. You could also face charges for being in the wrong place with the wrong people at the wrong time. If you have been charged with a crime, consulting with a skilled criminal defense lawyer is essential. You might be feeling confused, anxious, and overwhelmed, but you need to know that you are not alone. Our experienced criminal defense attorneys are here to help protect your rights, your best interests, and your future.

The team at our law firm has over 35 years of criminal law experience, and we have successfully handled a wide variety of criminal matters. With our background, knowledge of the law, and familiarity with the court systems in the counties we serve, we fully understand what is at stake when you are facing criminal charges. We have helped many clients throughout the region obtain favorable outcomes in even the most challenging situations, and we are ready to put our proven, client-focused approach to work for you.

Experienced Defense Counsel in Johnson County

When facing criminal charges, it’s crucial to find the best criminal defense attorney who understands the intricacies of North Carolina law. The North Carolina criminal justice system can be extremely intimidating, especially if you have never had a brush with the law before. The state’s criminal laws are complex, and the penalties for a conviction can be severe. When you choose the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC to assist you with your criminal case, we pledge to treat with you with the dignity and respect that you deserve, no matter what charges you may be facing. We know that there are at least two sides to every story, and we promise that you will have the opportunity to tell yours.
Our criminal defense attorneys will conduct a thorough review of the details of your arrest and the charges against you so that we can gain a complete understanding of the situation. We will communicate openly and honestly with you throughout the process, and we will help you explore all of your available options. You can depend on us to give you the information you need to make the best possible decisions regarding your unique circumstances.

Criminal Defense Cases We Handle

The best criminal defense attorney at Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC are equipped to handle a full range of criminal defense matters. We can help you if you are facing charges related to:

  • Drug crimes: Simple possession of a controlled substance is often prosecuted as a felony, with increased penalties for trafficking and distribution.
  • DWI: Driving while impaired is a serious offense in North Carolina, especially if it is your second or third offense.
  • Domestic violence: Allegations of domestic abuse, including assault on a female, assault in the presence of a minor, or violating a protective order require skilled defense counsel.
  • Theft: Retail theft, burglary, and robbery are among the most common types of theft crimes in North Carolina.
  • Violent crimes: Offenses involving violence, such as assault and aggravated assault, carry serious penalties. An aggressive defense is crucial.
  • White-collar crimes: As a criminal defense law firm, Our team can assist in defending against charges of fraud, embezzlement, and other financial-based offenses.
  • Probation violations: If you are accused of violating the terms of your probation, we will work hard to keep you out of jail.
  • Traffic offenses: Traffic violations such as speeding and reckless driving can lead to the loss of your license, but you may have options for taking action.

Our lawyers can also help you take steps to clear your criminal record through the process of expungement so that you can get the second chance that you deserve.

Schedule Your Free Consultation Today

If you or someone you love has been charged with a crime in North Carolina, contact our office right away. Call the federal criminal defense attorneys at Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC at 1-844-YO-PELEO or 919-989-3000 for a free, confidential consultation and case review with a member of our team today. We serve clients in Smithfield, Charlotte, Raleigh, Johnston County, Mecklenburg County, and the surrounding areas. Hablamos Español.

mainEntity.name: How long does the immigration process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration timelines vary greatly depending on your case type. Green card applications can take 8-33 months, while citizenship typically takes 8-12 months. Contact Vasquez Law Firm for a personalized timeline assessment.

mainEntity.name: Do I need an immigration lawyer?

acceptedAnswer.text: While not required, an immigration lawyer significantly improves your chances of success. Immigration law is complex and constantly changing. Our attorneys at Vasquez Law Firm ensure your application is complete and accurate.

mainEntity.name: How much does an immigration lawyer cost in Charlotte?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration attorney fees vary by case complexity. Vasquez Law Firm offers competitive rates and payment plans. Call 1-844-YO-PELEO for a free consultation and fee quote.

## Serving Charlotte and Surrounding Areas
Vasquez Law Firm proudly serves clients throughout Charlotte, Mecklenburg County, and the greater North Carolina area. With offices conveniently located in Charlotte, we're here to help with all your legal needs.


## Why Choose Vasquez Law Firm?
- **Experienced Attorneys**: Over 20 years of combined legal experience
- **Bilingual Services**: We speak English and Spanish
- **Free Consultation**: Call 1-844-YO-PELEO today
- **Proven Results**: Hundreds of satisfied clients
- **24/7 Availability**: We're here when you need us
